class.name: uwrt_mars_rover_drivetrain_hw/UWRTMarsRoverDrivetrainHardware
class.description: ROS2 Control hardware implementation of the UWRT drivetrain. We use the ActuatorInterface because the drivetrain can be thought of as just six different actuators. This is the simulation version
